subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[hot]] (because of high temperature)
# to [[warm]]; to [[heat]] something up (using hot water or fire)
# to [[burn]]; to [[injure]] (with high temperature)
# {{lb|zh|cooking}} to [[blanch]]
# {{lb|zh|chiefly|Cantonese}} to [[iron]]
#: {{zh-x|燙 恤衫|to '''iron''' a shirt|C}}
